meanings.definition: A lung disease caused by inhaling silica dust.
meanings.sent1: Silicoses can result from prolonged exposure to silica dust in mines.
meanings.sent2: The doctors diagnosed the miners with silicoses after conducting lung tests.
meanings.sent3: The silicoses in the miners made them realize the importance of wearing protective masks.
meanings.sent4: Silicoses crept into their lungs like a silent intruder, causing havoc within.
meanings.sent5: The image of silicoses clinging to the miners' lungs haunted their dreams.
